forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 11am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
